Plot: It's 1968, and four young, talented Australian Aboriginal girls learn about love, friendship and war when their all-girl group The Sapphires entertain the US troops in Vietnam.
Title: The Sapphires
Writer: Tony Briggs (adapted from the stage play by), Tony Briggs, Keith Thompson
Actors: Tanika Lonesborough, Nioka Brennan, Lynette Narkle, Kylie Belling
tomatoConsensus: While it's plenty predictable and sentimental, The Sapphires also has an irresistible feel-good vibe, winning music and charming performances to spare.
